BezShape - Class in shapes3d
A 3D shape generated by a 2D bezier curve in the XY plane being rotated 360 degrees about the Y axis.
BezShape(PApplet, Bezier2D, int, int) - Constructor for class shapes3d.BezShape
Create a 3D BezierShape object
BezShape(PApplet, Bezier2D, int, int, PVector, PVector) - Constructor for class shapes3d.BezShape
Create a 3D BezierShape object
The shape is recalculated so the [0,1,0] axis is now 'up'
The shape's coordinates are translated to make 'centreOfRot' the objects centre of rotation.

dTan - Variable in class shapes3d.PathTube
Warning: This should be changed as a last resort

This class represents a toroid (doughnut / donut shape)
